title: Anatomy & Structure
tip: Note the consistent structure in hands, face, and proportions.

hotspots.label: Misaligned eyes
hotspots.explanation: AI-generated eyes appear asymmetrical or misaligned, especially when the face is turned.

hotspots.label: Melting hands
hotspots.explanation: AI struggles with hands. Notice distorted fingers and inconsistent shading.

title: Lighting & Shadows
tip: Check if shadows match the light source direction.

hotspots.label: Inconsistent shadow direction
hotspots.explanation: AI may produce conflicting light angles. Real paintings keep shadows consistent with a single light source.

title: Textures & Surfaces
tip: Look for overly smooth or plastic-like textures in AI art.

hotspots.label: Plastic-like skin
hotspots.explanation: AI-generated skin may appear plastic or too perfect, lacking realistic pore or brush texture.

title: Symmetry & Composition
tip: Overly perfect symmetry can be suspicious.

title: Coherence in Detail
tip: Check for strange merges or ‘floating’ objects.

title: Symbolism & Intent
tip: Is there a cohesive narrative or historically accurate symbolism?
